quote: I have all these things that I want to say to her, like... Like how I can tell she's a lonely person, even if other people can't. Cause I know what it feels like to be lost and lonely and invisible.
quote_letters: I HAVE ALL THESE THINGS THAT I WANT TO SAY TO HER LIKE LIKE HOW I CAN TELL SHES A LONELY PERSON EVEN IF OTHER PEOPLE CANT CAUSE I KNOW WHAT IT FEELS LIKE TO BE LOST AND LONELY AND INVISIBLE
